name: twig/twig
description: Twig, the flexible, fast, and secure template language for PHP

name: doctrine/lexer
description: Base library for a lexer that can be used in Top-Down, Recursive Descent Parsers.

name: doctrine/cache
description: Caching library offering an object-oriented API for many cache backends

name: doctrine/inflector
description: Common String Manipulations with regard to casing and singular/plural rules.

name: symfony/icu
description: Contains an excerpt of the ICU data and classes to load it.

name: symfony/intl

suggest.ext-intl: to use the component with locales other than "en"

description: A PHP replacement layer for the C intl extension that includes additional data from the ICU library.

suggest.doctrine/dbal: For using the built-in ACL implementation
suggest.ircmaxell/password-compat: For using the BCrypt password encoder in PHP <5.5
suggest.symfony/class-loader: For using the ACL generateSql script
suggest.symfony/finder: For using the ACL generateSql script
suggest.symfony/routing: For using the HttpUtils class to create sub-requests, redirect the user, and match URLs
suggest.symfony/validator: For using the user password constraint

suggest.symfony/config: For using the all-in-one router or any loader

name: pimple/pimple
description: Pimple is a simple Dependency Injection Container for PHP 5.3

name: silex/silex
description: The PHP micro-framework based on the Symfony2 Components

name: monolog/monolog

suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Allow sending log messages to AWS services like DynamoDB
suggest.doctrine/couchdb: Allow sending log messages to a CouchDB server
suggest.ext-amqp: Allow sending log messages to an AMQP server (1.0+ required)
suggest.ext-mongo: Allow sending log messages to a MongoDB server
suggest.mlehner/gelf-php: Allow sending log messages to a GrayLog2 server
suggest.raven/raven: Allow sending log messages to a Sentry server
suggest.ruflin/elastica: Allow sending log messages to an Elastic Search server

description: Sends your logs to files, sockets, inboxes, databases and various web services

suggest.doctrine/annotations: For using the annotation mapping. You will also need doctrine/cache.
suggest.doctrine/cache: For using the default cached annotation reader

suggest.symfony/security-csrf: For protecting forms against CSRF attacks.

suggest.symfony/console: Allows use of the command line interface

suggest.symfony/yaml: If you want to use YAML Metadata Mapping Driver

suggest.symfony/proxy-manager-bridge: Generate service proxies to lazy load them

suggest.jms/serializer: Required to serialize data to XML and JSON
suggest.phpdocumentor/reflection-docblock: Required to display object methods description
suggest.symfony/yaml: Required to serialize data to YAML format
